pages.title: Bottle Of Somnium
pages.text: A Bottle of Somnium is essential for practicing alchemy. It serves as a base potion alongside loran energy, and is necessary for creating all manner of magical remedies. But the benefits of Somnium don't stop there - it's also great for your health and energy! Acting as a bridge between two worlds, Somnium is said to have an energy that surpasses even mana. Whether you're a budding alchemist or simply looking to boost your vitality, a Bottle of Somnium is a must-have.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Crafting Table is a tool for creating essences and potions. Use it to craft helpful remedies for your journey through the Abyss.
